education_text.0: Patrick Cousot (born 3 December 1948) is a French computer scientist, currently Silver Professor of Computer Science at the      Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences,      New York University New York University, USAPatrick Cousot (born 3 December 1948) is a French computer scientist, currently Silver Professor of Computer Science at the      Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences,      New York University New York University, USA
